name: Dataleap
headline: Perplexity for Consultants
description:
Dataleap is a GenAI-powered market research platform for management consulting firms and corporate strategy departments. Think Perplexity for Consultants.

We combine the natural language interface from chatGPT with trusted, verifiable market data from best-in-class data providers. We do the heavy lifting of aggregating all data sources into a single interface.

We optimize the whole market research workflow from finding the right information, managing the internal knowledge base as well as sharing information with team members. 

We already work with leading consultancies like BCG and industry giants like Siemens Energy and Uniper.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:marketplace; industry:market-research; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jan Damm, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Dataleap. Before Dataleap, I worked as an APM in the Google search team as well as a consultant at McKinsey and the Siemens AI Lab.

founders.name: Jan-Hendrik Ruettinger, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CTO at Dataleap. Before Dataleap, I worked as an AI researcher at Oxford University and Volkswagen. I also had a brief stint in consulting at BCG.

# Enterprise grade securitykeeps your data protected
# Enterprise grade security keeps your data protected
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jI9S5RSUIw7zK8XklwKVAZdqD5c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jI9S5RSUIw7zK8XklwKVAZdqD5c.png)
Data encryption
Data & chats are encrypted with AES-256. Data in transit is encrypted with TLS 1.3 using AES-256.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GwDPM6atVlDYjPDr8g7rdr33EU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GwDPM6atVlDYjPDr8g7rdr33EU.png)
Data segregation
Data is separated by workspace and organisation using row-level access mechanisms.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8LSD2l6PnsC0r5WGce7zlwE1FAI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8LSD2l6PnsC0r5WGce7zlwE1FAI.png)
No training data
Dataleap only uses models where the inputted data is not used for training of the models.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZglhAZmEQcCaxlZRpsT3lCaJk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZglhAZmEQcCaxlZRpsT3lCaJk.png)
Restrictive access
Access to data is strictly limited to essential personnel based on the principle of least privilege.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WVS1BrMudvlI0oB7nscf9XGP76M.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WVS1BrMudvlI0oB7nscf9XGP76M.png)
**GDPR Compliant**
We safeguard your data through secure processing and provide mechanisms to exercising GDPR rights
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NxWRQpt7r6wH1ABmrjEoCsEGgc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NxWRQpt7r6wH1ABmrjEoCsEGgc.png)
**SOC 2 Type 2**
Dataleap is in the process of becoming SOC2 Type 2 compliant. Providing our secure handling of user data and adhering to strict & vetted security processes.
**IN PROGRESS**
**PLANNED**
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BPPTvCydyB2cWrdDrbIJp4G2RI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rOzDz04b0WnzOGLnwWTtiZOzfA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BPPTvCydyB2cWrdDrbIJp4G2RI.png)
**ISO 27001**
We are planning to get ISO 27001 certified in Q4 2024, with further ensures the integrity of customer data, minimises risks and guarantees service continuity

# Enterprise grade securitykeeps your data protected
# Enterprise grade security keeps your data protected
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jI9S5RSUIw7zK8XklwKVAZdqD5c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jI9S5RSUIw7zK8XklwKVAZdqD5c.png)
Data encryption
Data & chats are encrypted with AES-256. Data in transit is encrypted with TLS 1.3 using AES-256.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GwDPM6atVlDYjPDr8g7rdr33EU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GwDPM6atVlDYjPDr8g7rdr33EU.png)
Data segregation
Data is separated by workspace and organisation using row-level access mechanisms.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8LSD2l6PnsC0r5WGce7zlwE1FAI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8LSD2l6PnsC0r5WGce7zlwE1FAI.png)
No training data
Dataleap only uses models where the inputted data is not used for training of the models.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZglhAZmEQcCaxlZRpsT3lCaJk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZglhAZmEQcCaxlZRpsT3lCaJk.png)
Restrictive access
Access to data is strictly limited to essential personnel based on the principle of least privilege.

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WVS1BrMudvlI0oB7nscf9XGP76M.png)

generated_description:
**Dataleap: The Future of Market Research for Consultants**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Dataleap is a fresh face in the market research landscape, specifically tailored for management consulting firms and corporate strategy divisions. Often described as "Perplexity for Consultants," Dataleap leverages generative AI to streamline the research workflow, providing a user experience reminiscent of ChatGPT while ensuring access to data from reputable sources.

### What Makes Dataleap Stand Out?

1. **Natural Language Interface**: Dataleap uniquely blends the conversational abilities of ChatGPT with a vast repository of reliable market data. This means users can not only ask questions in plain language but also receive answers linked directly to the credible sources they come from.

2. **Workflow Optimization**: Dataleap simplifies the research process, whether it's locating the right insights, managing a team’s internal knowledge base, or sharing findings seamlessly. Collaboration is baked into the platform, making it easier for teams to bolster their strategic decisions with sound data.

3. **Enterprise-Grade Security**: With robust data encryption (AES-256) and strict access controls, Dataleap ensures that sensitive information is well protected. As they work towards SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, they’re committed to the highest standards of data security.

4. **Trusted Collaborators**: The company has already formed partnerships with industry giants like BCG, Siemens Energy, and Uniper, standing testament to its reliability and effectiveness in the field.

5. **Small Team, Big Impact**: Currently with just two employees, including Group Partner Harj Taggar from Y Combinator (part of Batch S24), Dataleap embodies the lean startup ethos. They’re focusing on making their AI assistant an indispensable tool for consultants everywhere.

### What’s Next for Dataleap?

With aspirations to continue building on its solid foundation, Dataleap is looking at expanding its integrations and features to meet the high-paced demands of the consulting world. They are currently working on seamless SharePoint integrations and expanding their data extraction capabilities.

### Conclusion

Dataleap is shaking up how consultants conduct market research by marrying AI with practical, verifiable data access. As more professionals recognize the value of high-quality, actionable insights—faster and more efficiently—Dataleap is on track to become a vital player in the generative AI space for enterprise research.

For more exploration, check out their website at [Dataleap.ai](https://dataleap.ai/) and book a demo to see their AI research assistant in action.
